DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : The investigator conduct secondary analysis Sex Hormones Lipoproteins Adolescent Males Study ( HD/HL18281 ) , 3-year ( 1984-1987 ) study lipid , blood pressure , weight , fat patterning , sex steroid hormone ( SSH ) adolescent male . A total 664 black white male , age 10-15 , enrol study design series repeat data collection two year within age cohort . Cross-sectional analysis use explain difference adolescence sex steroid hormone sex steroid hormone-lipid relationship black white boy boy without family history coronary heart disease.. When data originally collect study , theoretical model flexible longitudinal analytic technique develop , available computer use . These technique , support software , allow powerful complete analysis data . DESIGN NARRATIVE : The primary aim analysis explain contribution change sex steroid hormone fat pattern change plasma concentration high ( HDL-C ) low ( LDL-C ) density lipoprotein cholesterol , triglyceride ( TG ) , apolipoproteins ( apo ) Al , All , B occur puberty male . Sex steroid hormone assay include estradiol ( E2 ) free testosterone ( T ) . The following hypothesis test : ( 1 ) increase free T predicts/leads decrease HDL-C increase LDL-C , apo B , LDL-C/HDL-C ratio adolescent male ; ( 2 ) increase E2 predict decrease apo B , LDL-C LDL-C/HDL- C ratio , resultant effect vary adiposity fat patterning ; ( 3 ) rapid weight gain predicts increase central adiposity , define ratio truncal skinfolds total skinfolds , great decrease HDL-C increase triglyceride , apo B , LDL-C LDL- C/HDL-C ratio . Rapid weight gain predicts increase E2 , atherogenic effect increase central adiposity lipid great anti- atherogenic effect E2 . These analysis provide well understanding metabolic factor underlie obesity-hormone-lipoprotein relationship .
